params._buyer: The address of the buyer to approve to buy from the listing.
params._listingId: The ID of the listing to update.
params._toApprove: Whether to approve the buyer to buy from the listing.

params._currency: The address of the currency to approve as a form of payment for the listing.
params._listingId: The ID of the listing to update.
params._pricePerTokenInCurrency: The price per token for the currency to approve.

params._buyFor: The recipient of the NFTs being bought.
params._currency: The currency to use to pay for NFTs.
params._expectedTotalPrice: The expected total price to pay for the NFTs being bought.
params._listingId: The ID of the listing to update.
params._quantity: The quantity of NFTs to buy from the listing.

params._listingId: The ID of the listing to cancel.

params._params: The parameters of a listing a seller sets when creating a listing.

returns.listingId: The unique integer ID of the listing.

params._listingId: The ID of the listing to fetch.

totalListings().details: At any point, the return value is the ID of the next listing created.

params._listingId: The ID of the listing to update.
params._params: The parameters of a listing a seller sets when updating a listing.

approveBuyerForListing(uint256,address,b.notice: Approve a buyer to buy from a reserved listing.

approveCurrencyForListing(uint256,addres.notice: Approve a currency as a form of payment for the listing.

createListing((address,uint256,uint256,a.notice: List NFTs (ERC721 or ERC1155) for sale at a fixed price.

getAllListings(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns all listings between the start and end Id (both inclusive) provided.

getAllValidListings(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns all valid listings between the start and end Id (both inclusive) provided.          A valid listing is where the listing creator still owns and has approved Marketplace          to transfer the listed NFTs.

getListing(uint256).notice: Returns a listing at the provided listing ID.

totalListings().notice: Returns the total number of listings created.

updateListing(uint256,(address,uint256,u.notice: Update parameters of a listing of NFTs.
